title: Syntheses - corpus principiorum et notitiarum.
description: Welcome to the curated repository of ARUSHIK,  a discerning individual who prefers the veil of anonymity,  yet invites the astute observer to discern the truth beneath.

items.title: The Game of Life
items.summary: Rendering of Conway’s Game of Life Table of Contents Cellular Automata Conway’s game of life Rules Implementation Shortcomings Cellular Automata Cellular Automata is a field of computer science dealing with modelling certain systems by dividng a space into a grid of cells, each cell can take upon a finite number of states. The states are then influenced and modified according to a set of rules which similarly influence neighbouring cells.
